import { Typography,Paper,Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableRow,TableContainer,Button } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' const BooksTable = ({rows, selectedBook, de}) => { return( Book Table Book ID Book Name Author { rows.length>0? rows.map(row=>( {row.id} {row.name} {row.author} )):( No Data ) }
) } export default BooksTable
